entities

Class Exercise

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Exercise

  • public class Exercise
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class representing an Exercise. Needs to be injected with an ExerciseContext produced by the ExerciseContextFactory.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Exercise(int id, ExerciseContext context)
      To create an Exercise you need to provide ExerciseContext .

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected ExerciseContext getContext()
      returns the exercise context.
      int getId()
      Gets the ID of the Exercise.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the Exercise.
      void terminate()
      Shuts the taskPool down in order to reboot the system.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Exercise

        public Exercise(int id,
        ExerciseContext context)
         throws NoProperParameterException
        To create an Exercise you need to provide ExerciseContext .
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the new exercise (the Course takes care of assigning IDs to exercises)
        context - An ExerciseContext produced by the ExerciseContextFactory
        Throws:
        NoProperParameterException - If the context is null.
